species.name: Base Happiness
species.info: The happiness when caught by a normal Pokéball; up to 255.

species.name: Egg Group
species.info: A list of egg groups this species is a member of.

species.name: Habitat
species.info: The habitat this species can be encountered in a game.

species.name: Shape
species.info: The shape of this Pokémon for Pokédex search.

species.name: Generation
species.info: The generation this Pokémon species was introduced in.

species.name: Capture Rate
species.info: The higher the number, the easier the catch (upto 255).
